Fictional Worlds & Universes.name: Pop Culture Pantheon
Fictional Worlds & Universes.description: Test your knowledge of beloved characters and iconic moments from film, television, and literature. From galactic heroes to mischievous spies, this quiz covers a wide range of fictional universes. Are you a true pop culture aficionado?

questions.text: In the movie 'Star Wars' what kind of creature is Chewbacca?
What is the name of the POW camp where 'Hogan's Heroes' are held?
What cartoon character traveled in a time machine with Mr. Peabody?
In the movie 'Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me' what is the name of Dr. Evil's diminutive clone?
What animated character has a crush on the Little Red Haired Girl?
What fictional character claims to be 'smarter than the average bear'?
In what high school does the gang from the 'Archie' comic strip attend?
In the famous ballet 'The Nutcracker' who does the hero defeat?
